mapper.select: SELECT e.exhibitNum, e.exhibitName, TO_CHAR(exhibitStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitStart, TO_CHAR(exhibitEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitEnd, host, supervise, h.hallName FROM exhibit e JOIN exhibitHall h ON e.hallNum=h.hallNum LEFT OUTER JOIN exhibitHall h ON e.hallNum=h.hallNum WHERE e.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
SELECT audience||' '||exprice priceString FROM ExhibitPrice ep JOIN AUDIENCELEVEL al ON ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM = al.AUDIENCELEVELNUM WHERE ep.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} ORDER BY ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM ASC
SELECT SUM(total) FROM orders o JOIN bookExhibit b ON o.approveNum=b.approveNum JOIN exhibit e ON b.exhibitNum=e.exhibitNum WHERE e.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM exhibit e JOIN bookExhibit b ON e.exhibitNum=b.exhibitNum JOIN orders o ON b.approveNum=o.approveNum WHERE b.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
